backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing authorization, user profiles, and per-user note CRUD with timestamp sorting and image references.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping fullscreen preview requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and dark-mode color tokens using OKLCH variables for consistent theme styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup flow, dark mode, and navigation to dashboard.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenImageM: Portal-based fullscreen image viewer with escape/backdrop/click isolation and top-layer event handling.
frontend/src/components/NoteCard.tsx: Card UI showing note metadata, preview, encryption state, and inline edit/delete actions with safe event handling.
Displays detailed view of a note with decryption, image preview, and delete functionality in a modal.
frontend/src/components/NoteFormModal.ts: Provides a modal form for creating or editing notes with encryption, image uploads, and text import support.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Simple modal prompting new users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and provides login/logout functionality via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: React Query hooks to list, fetch, create, update, and delete notes using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the callerâ€™s user profile with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining base styles and dark mode color variables for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen that triggers Internet Identity authentication and shows progress feedback.
frontend/src/screens/NotesDashboard.tsx: Main dashboard UI that lists notes, supports searching, creating, viewing, and editing notes, and handles loading and logout.
frontend/src/utils/cryptoNotes.ts: Implements password-based AES-GCM encryption and decryption for note content using Web Crypto API.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachments.ts: Validates image file type/size and generates base64 previews using FileReader.
frontend/src/utils/noteSearch.ts: Filters notes by matching query text against note titles and content.
frontend/src/utils/safeErrorReason.ts: Converts unknown errors into short, safe user-facing messages.
frontend/src/utils/txtImport.ts: Reads and returns plain text from .txt files using FileReader with validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles extracting, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and session-stored parameters for app state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, known issues, and state for the fullscreen image preview fix.
